activities: TiVo Inc. is a global provider of digital media services.  TiVo provides services to multichannel video providers in Europe.  In testing services provided to multichannel video providers, TiVo may collect limited individually identifiable information from consumers participating in such tests.
corpofftitle1: SVP, General Counsel, Secretary & Chief Privacy Officer
eucountries: Finland, Germany, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
